thread.title: SEC Shorts - Steve Spurrier mulls over options for his next career
thread.title_full: SEC Shorts - Steve Spurrier mulls over options for his next career | AL.com

author: Robert Clay | rclay@al.com
title: SEC Shorts - Steve Spurrier mulls over options for his next career
text:
It's safe to say it's been a wild week for Steve Spurrier. After abruptly announcing his resignation as the South Carolina football coach, Spurrier has been on a whirlwind tour including a big stop as a guest picker on ESPN's College Gameday. As for what comes next in his future, he definitely has his choice of options. In this week's installment of SEC Shorts , the crew wondered just who might be trying to lure the Old Ball Coach out of his self imposed retirement and into the next stage of his coaching career.
SEC Shorts, created by Robert Clay and Josh Snead, is a weekly sketch comedy segment offering a look at the lighter side of fan culture and storylines surrounding SEC sports. Follow them on Twitter @roberttheclay and @josnead
